1.name: Toy Story
1.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

2.name: Jumanji
2.description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

3.name: Se7en
3.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

4.name: Waterworld
4.description: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

5.name: The Usual Suspects
5.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

6.name: Apollo 13
6.description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

7.name: Braveheart
7.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

8.name: Heat
8.description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

9.name: Clueless
9.description: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

10.name: Batman Forever
10.description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

11.name: Kids
11.description: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

12.name: Casino
12.description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

13.name: Showgirls
13.description: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

14.name: Casper
14.description: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

15.name: Species
15.description: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

16.name: Twelve Monkeys
16.description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

17.name: Mimi wo sumaseba
17.description: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

18.name: Bad Boys
18.description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

19.name: GoldenEye
19.description: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

20.name: Friday
20.description: Two homies, Smokey and Craig, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the $200 they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.

21.name: Mortal Kombat
21.description: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

22.name: Sense and Sensibility
22.description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.

23.name: Empire Records
23.description: 24 hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

24.name: Before Sunrise
24.description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

25.name: Kôkaku Kidôtai
25.description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

26.name: Pocahontas
26.description: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

27.name: Leaving Las Vegas
27.description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

28.name: Judge Dredd
28.description: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

29.name: Desperado
29.description: A gunslinger's embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

30.name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
30.description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

31.name: A Walk in the Clouds
31.description: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

32.name: Four Rooms
32.description: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

33.name: Hackers
33.description: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

34.name: Outbreak
34.description: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

35.name: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
35.description: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

36.name: The Basketball Diaries
36.description: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

37.name: Billy Madison
37.description: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

38.name: Tank Girl
38.description: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

39.name: The American President
39.description: Comedy-drama about a widowed U.S. President and a lobbyist who fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception", and sparks fly anyway.

40.name: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
40.description: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

41.name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
41.description: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

42.name: The Quick and the Dead
42.description: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

43.name: Mallrats
43.description: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

44.name: Copycat
44.description: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

45.name: Johnny Mnemonic
45.description: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

46.name: Congo
46.description: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

47.name: Babe
47.description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

48.name: Sabrina
48.description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

49.name: Now and Then
49.description: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

50.name: Higher Learning
50.description: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.
